name: Gobi Aloo Wrap Vegan Red Lentils Hummus Wrap with Cauliflower and Potatoes
description: Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, nut, yeast. It can be made gluten-free with GF wraps. It can be made grain-free by skipping the wraps or using lettuce leaves. Serve in a bowl.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon Sriracha sauce or to taste
1 x Recipe Gobi Aloo mutter (Cauliflower Potato and peas stir fry - link see notes)

itemListElement.text: Add a teaspoon of oil in a deep pan and heat on medium. Toast washed lentils in oil for 2 minutes. Add water, salt, spices, sriracha and tomato. Mix well. Partially cover and cook at low-medium heat. (13-15 minutes). Mix and mash after 15 minutes and use.
itemListElement.name: Add a teaspoon of oil in a deep pan and heat on medium. Toast washed lentils in oil for 2 minutes. Add water, salt, spices, sriracha and tomato. Mix well. Partially cover and cook at low-medium heat. (13-15 minutes). Mix and mash after 15 minutes and use.

itemListElement.text: Warm the tortilla. Spread a layer of lentil hummus. Add some more lentils at the 2/3  point of the tortilla.
itemListElement.name: Warm the tortilla. Spread a layer of lentil hummus. Add some more lentils at the 2/3  point of the tortilla.

itemListElement.text: Top with Cauliflower Potato and Peas stir fry.
itemListElement.name: Top with Cauliflower Potato and Peas stir fry.

itemListElement.text: Top with pickled onions, salt and pepper and cilantro.
itemListElement.name: Top with pickled onions, salt and pepper and cilantro.

itemListElement.text: Wrap, cut and serve with cilantro chutney or Sriracha/hot sauce.
itemListElement.name: Wrap, cut and serve with cilantro chutney or Sriracha/hot sauce.

keywords: red lentil hummus, vegan hummus wrap, vegan wrap recipe
